metadata.dc:author: Marfil, Jorge A
Rodríguez López, Raquel
González Poveda, Pedro
metadata.dc:description: The authors analyse from a scientific and legal perspective, how paternity analysis in the prenatal period can be reliably performed exactly the same as with newborns, and therefore, establish kinship in accordance with established regulations. In other words, there is an option for those who might not want to wait until birth to establish kinship.
metadata.dc:title: El derecho de familia, testigo del análisis de paternidad prenatal.
[Family law, witness of the analysis of prenatal paternity].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de derecho y genoma humano = Law and the human genome review
